sentences.en: a highly significant discovery
sentences.cn: 有重大意义的发现

sentences.en: A significant number of drivers fail to keep to speed limits.
sentences.cn: 有相当多的司机不遵守车速限制。

sentences.en: A significant part of Japan’s wealth is invested in the West.
sentences.cn: 日本有很大一部分财富投资在西方国家。

sentences.en: A small but significant number of 11-year-olds are illiterate.
sentences.cn: 数量不多但仍有相当一部分11岁孩子是文盲。

sentences.en: But above all, the most significant assessment they will make will be how it affects the subjects psychologically.
sentences.cn: 但首先，他们将作出的最重要的评估是，它在心理上将如何影响被试者们。

sentences.en: But if they do, it will be significant for a few reasons.
sentences.cn: 但是，如果他们真的这样做，这必有几个重要的原因。

sentences.en: For example, we say, “I love you” to our parents or significant other when we hang up the phone, not because we mean it, but out of habit.
sentences.cn: 比方说，我们会在电话里和父母或者某个重要的人说“我爱你”，并不因为我们真的想这么说，而是因为习惯。

sentences.en: He gave her a significant look.
sentences.cn: 他意味深长地看了她一眼.

sentences.en: His most significant political achievement was the abolition of the death penalty.
sentences.cn: 他政治上最重大的成就是废除了死刑。

sentences.en: Penicillin was an extremely significant medical discovery.
sentences.cn: 青霉素是极其重要的医学发现.

sentences.en: Please inform us if there are any significant changes in your plans.
sentences.cn: 你们的计划如有重大变动，请通知我们。

sentences.en: Police said there had been a significant development in the case.
sentences.cn: 警方说此案已经有了重大进展。

sentences.en: She cast him a significant smile.
sentences.cn: 她向他投去意味深长的一笑.

sentences.en: Significant questions will go unasked.
sentences.cn: 重大问题不会问到。

sentences.en: Some of the most significant issues were neglected.
sentences.cn: 最重要的问题中,有些被忽略了.

sentences.en: Susan nodded sagely as if what I had said was profoundly significant.
sentences.cn: 苏珊洞悉一切似的点点头，好像我所说的话意义深刻。

sentences.en: The accident is already shaping up as a significant environmental disaster.
sentences.cn: 这次事故已经造成严重的环境灾难。

sentences.en: The company looks poised to make a significant breakthrough in China.
sentences.cn: 这家公司看来很有把握在中国取得重大突破。

sentences.en: The research is too unfocused to have any significant impact.
sentences.cn: 这一次的研究太零散，难以发挥重大的作用。

sentences.en: The result is highly significant for the future of the province.
sentences.cn: 这一结果对该省的未来意义重大。

sentences.en: The rise in temperature is not statistically significant .
sentences.cn: 从统计角度来看，气温的上升并不明显。

sentences.en: There are significant parallels with the 1980s.
sentences.cn: 与20世纪80年代有明显相似之处。

sentences.en: There is a significant difference between the number of home births now and ten years ago.
sentences.cn: 现在家中分娩的人数和十年前相比有明显的差别。

sentences.en: There were significant similarities between mother and son.
sentences.cn: 母子之间有很多相像的地方。

sentences.en: Two significant constants have been found in a number of research studies.
sentences.cn: 若干研究已经发现了两个重要常量。

words.tran_cn: 有意义的；表示…的；为…提供推定证据的
意味深长地；值得注目地
有重要性；要紧；冒充内行
奥妙的,暗示的,征候的,预兆的,含蓄的,象征的
流露的,证明的,有力的,领会的,隐密的
重要的,决定的,紧要的,伟大的,主要的,突出的,有影响的

phrases.tran_cn: 有意味的形式；蕴意形式；言之有意的形式
显著水准；检验水准；有效水平

trans.tran_cn: 重要的，显著的，意味深长的
trans.tran_en: having an important effect or influence, especially on what will happen in the future
